Key Match Events: Trent Boult was named Player of the Match
New Zealand won by 5 wickets (with 160 balls remaining)
Post-Match Reflections: Kane Williamson: 'We knew anybody can beat anybody and we've seen that'

Kusal Mendis: 'I got the captaincy after two games. Quite enjoyed it. Disappointed with my own performance, but enjoyed the captaincy. Very happy to see a couple of young players putting their hands up to perform. They are our future.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a day-night game at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru
Others: The match was part of the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023-24
